verses.verse: PSALM 54Prayer for Defense against Enemies.For the music director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the Ziphites came and said to Saul, “Is David not keeping himself hidden among us?” (Possibly Contemplative; or Didactic; or Skillful Psalm) (1 Sam 23:19; 26:1) Save me, God, by Your name, And (Lit judge) vindicate me by Your power.
Hear my prayer, God; Listen to the words of my mouth.
For strangers have risen against me And violent men have sought my (Or soul) life; They have not set God before them. Selah
Behold, God is my helper; The Lord is (Lit as those who sustain) the sustainer of my soul.
(LXX; MT The evil will return) He will pay back the evil to my enemies; (Or Put to silence) Destroy them in Your (Or truth) faithfulness.
(Or With a voluntary offering) Willingly I will sacrifice to You; I will praise Your name, LORD, for it is good.
For (Or it; i. e., His name) He has saved me from all (Or distress) trouble, And my eye has looked with satisfaction upon my enemies.
